data.actual_result: Can only scroll down a small amount of the page (not even past the first paragraph on my iPhone).
data.expected_result: Able to scroll down and read the entire page.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Cannot fully scroll down pages on the Developer Portal of the Discord website.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open one of the pages seen on the sidebar of the Developer Portal, i.e. <> - Scroll to the bottom of the page.
